chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our navigation game. Are you ready to begin the adventure?
Great! Let's start. Look around and describe where you are. What do you see?
Hmm, that's interesting. Let's take a closer look. Look to your left, do you see a small island with a leopard on it?
Fantastic! Now, here's what you need to do. Move to the left of the leopard, making sure to pass just below it. Let me know once you've done that.
Great job! Now, keep going forward until you see a wooden twig. Can you spot it?
Perfect! Now, carefully cross the wooden twig, and you'll reach a larger island. On this island, you'll find a parrot and an elephant. Can you see them?
Wonderful! Walk over the head of the parrot and continue south, going in between the parrot and the elephant. Let me know once you've done that.
Fantastic! You're doing great. Now, from there, continue on the same path, but head slightly to the southeast. You'll come across three rocks - two gray ones and a darker one. Can you see them?
Apologies for the confusion. Let's adjust the path. Walk below the frog in a southerly direction. Keep going until you reach a u-turn. Let me know once you've done that.

Excellent! Now, carefully cross over the back of a crocodile, heading back to the island with the parrot and the elephant, but this time, go to the left (west). Let me know once you've crossed over the crocodile.
Great work! Now, continue in the same direction, crossing over two gray rocks. These rocks will lead you to an island with a giraffe on it. Can you see the giraffe?

Perfect! Now, go below the giraffe in a southwest direction. After that, make a 90 degree turn to the left (southeast) and cross over to another island. On this island, you'll find a snake. Can you see it?
Great job! To continue, go over the snake and keep moving forward. You're almost there! Let me know once you've done that.
Fantastic! You're almost at the final objective. Now, take a moment to look around. Can you see anything interesting or any landmarks nearby?
Ah, wonderful! You've found the treasure chest, congratulations! You've successfully completed the path and reached the final objective. Well done! I hope you enjoyed the adventure.
That's fantastic to hear! I'm glad you had a great time. If you'd like to play again or have any other questions, feel free to let me know. Have a wonderful day!
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to guide you through the adventure. Thank you for playing. Have a fantastic day and take care!
Goodbye! Take care and see you next time!

chat.msg: Hello! Are you ready to begin the game?

Great! Let's start.

Step 1: Please take a few steps to your left (west) from the white dog. Can you see a wooden bench nearby?

Good! Now, below the wooden bench, there is a stream. Please cross the stream and head towards the florist stand. But don't reach the stand just yet. Instead, make a U-turn and cross the stream again, heading back towards the white dog. Can you see a wooden branch crossing a river near the dog?

Certainly! Starting from the wooden bench, go west and cross the stream. Then, make a U-turn and cross the stream again, heading back towards the white dog. Look for a wooden branch crossing a river near the dog. Can you see it now?

Great! Now that you see the wooden branch, cross over it towards the south. Keep going southward. You will come across another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you spot it ahead?
Excellent! Walk over the mat near the picnic and pay attention to a bowl of berries. After that, continue moving to the west. Can you see the berries and continue moving towards the west?
Perfect! Now, there is another wooden branch ahead that crosses the river. Cross the branch, this time heading north. Take a moment to cross the river and let me know when you're on the other side.

Great job! Now that you've crossed the river, there is a green bush nearby. Instead of touching the green bush, I want you to go around it from the right side. Keep walking until you reach the florist stand. Let me know when you are by the stand.

Wonderful! Now, turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. As you continue westward, you will come across a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass the bridge to the west. Let me know when you've reached the other side of the bridge.

Great progress! Just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench and reading newspapers. Walk a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. Let me know when you've reached the green bush next to the end of the wooden branch.

chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready to embark on an adventure? Let's get started! You are currently at the opening of a tent. Can you see anything interesting around you?
Great! You've spotted a dog. Now, let's begin the journey. Take a few steps south from the tent and you'll find a trail. Follow that trail until you reach the dog. Let me know when you're there!
Perfect! You've reached the puppy. Well done! Now, let's continue. Take a left turn and head east. Keep going until you see a small bonfire just north of the trail. Can you see it?

Great job! You've reached the bonfire. Now, the path veers off the trail. Turn left and go north, passing the fire. Once you've done that, continue heading east on the trail. Let me know when you're there!

Fantastic! You're doing great. Now, keep following the trail eastward until you come across two red mushrooms. These mushrooms will be on your way to your next destination. Let me know when you spot them!

Awesome! You've found the two red mushrooms. Next, you're going to make a right u-turn without touching the blue car nearby. Head back west until you reach a fork in the trail. Let me know when you get to the fork!
Excellent! You've made it to the fork in the trail. Now, at the fork, take the left branch and continue southward. As you navigate, you will pass east of a telescope. Can you see it?

Fantastic! You're making great progress. Now, here's a little challenge. Instead of following the trail, I want you to veer right and take an off-trail shortcut. Go around the telescope and keep going until you find yourself back on the trail. Let me know when you've rejoined the trail!

Well done! You have successfully rejoined the trail. Now, let's continue westward on the trail. As you proceed, you'll eventually come across a low wall of rocks surrounding a wooden cabin. This is your final objective. Can you see the cabin yet?

Amazing! You've reached the wooden cabin, the final objective. Congratulations on completing the path! I hope you enjoyed the journey. If you'd like to play again or explore the map further, just let me know.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: They want to better express themselves
